typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulmnt
source(output(
		{ Org commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit√©} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig√©} as string,
		{ATC Corrig√©} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Recept de march} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{Type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Ann√©e civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qt√© cd√©e} as string,
		{CA cd√©} as string,
		{Qt√© livr√©e} as string,
		{CA livr√©} as string,
		{Qt√© factur√©e} as string,
		{CA factur√©} as string,
		{Cout standard cd√©} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livr√©} as string,
		{Cout standard factur√©} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string,
		reference as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		toroll as string,
		indexcols2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturation
source(output(
		Commande as string,
		{R√©f√©rence Offre BA} as string,
		{Qt√© Cd√©e} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> association
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{R√©f√©rence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Quantit√©} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		Canal as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Num√©ro interne 2} as string,
		{Cr√©ateur offre} as string,
		Source as string,
		UserLowerCase as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> offre
source(output(
		{ClÔøΩ RÔøΩfÔøΩrentiel} as string,
		{Recherche ClÔøΩ EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal dÔøΩbut} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{DÔøΩpartement} as string,
		DR as string,
		User_lowerCase as string,
		source as string,
		Right_DR as string,
		Right_User_lowerCase as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> refAtc
InnerJoin derive(ca_final = {CA factur√©},
		qt_final = {Qt√© factur√©e},
		data_origin = "facturation avec matching",
		canal_final = iif( {Canal distribution}=="43" ,  "Chantier" , "Diffus" )) ~> DerivedColumn1
association select(mapColumn(
		Commande,
		no_offre = {R√©f√©rence Offre BA},
		{Qt√© Cd√©e}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sAssociation
Join4 select(mapColumn(
		{Org commerciale} = { Org commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activit√©},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrig√©},
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qt√© factur√©e},
		{CA factur√©},
		year,
		yearmonth,
		reference,
		article = reference,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		origin,
		no_offre,
		indexcols2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectfacturation
sEcoul, selectfacturation join(ecoulmnt@indexcols2 == selectfacturation@indexcols2,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoin
DerivedColumn2, sAssociation join({Document de vente} == Commande,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join4
facturation derive(origin = "facturation") ~> DerivedColumn2
ecoulmnt derive(origin = "ecoulement") ~> sEcoul
sEcoul, selectfacturation join(ecoulmnt@indexcols2 == selectfacturation@indexcols2,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullleft
fullleft filter(isNull(selectfacturation@origin)) ~> filterLeft
filterLeft derive({Canal distribution} = "42",
		ca_final = toString(-1*toDouble(ca_ecoulement)),
		qt_final = toString(-1*toDouble(qte_ecc)),
		data_origin = "decrementation ecoulement sans matching") ~> DerivedColumn4
sEcoul, selectfacturation join(ecoulmnt@indexcols2 == selectfacturation@indexcols2,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullRght
fullRght filter(isNull(sEcoul@origin)) ~> filterRight
filterRight derive(ca_final = {CA factur√©},
		qt_final = {Qt√© factur√©e},
		data_origin = "facturation sans ecoulement",
		marque_name = iif({Org commerciale}=="1604", "SaunierDuval", "Vaillant"),
		canal_final = iif( {Canal distribution}=="43" ,  "Chantier" , "Diffus" )) ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn5 select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = {Org commerciale},
		marque_name,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activit√©},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrig√©},
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString = {Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qt√© factur√©e},
		{CA factur√©},
		year = selectfacturation@year,
		yearmonth = selectfacturation@yearmonth,
		reference = selectfacturation@reference,
		article = selectfacturation@reference,
		HubSAPid = selectfacturation@HubSAPid,
		toreplicate = selectfacturation@toreplicate,
		indexcols2 = selectfacturation@indexcols2,
		origin = selectfacturation@origin,
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endRight
addCanalFinal select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = ecoulmnt@yearmonth,
		year = ecoulmnt@year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = ecoulmnt@HubSAPid,
		reference = ecoulmnt@reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate = ecoulmnt@toreplicate,
		dd,
		indexcols2 = ecoulmnt@indexcols2,
		origin = sEcoul@origin,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		data_origin,
		{Canal distribution},
		canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endLeft
Select4 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endjoin
Select7, endRight union(byName: true)~> Union1
DerivedColumn1, selectOffre join(no_offre == Offre,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOffre
Aggregate2 select(mapColumn(
		Offre,
		{ATC performance} = ATC,
		{offre canal} = canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectOffre
Aggregate1 select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectATC
refAtc aggregate(groupBy(Marque,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc),
	ATC = max(ATC),
		NomATC = max(NomATC),
		Matricule = max(Matricule)) ~> Aggregate1
JoinOffre select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = ecoulmnt@yearmonth,
		year = ecoulmnt@year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = ecoulmnt@HubSAPid,
		reference = ecoulmnt@reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate = ecoulmnt@toreplicate,
		dd,
		{ Org commerciale} = {Org commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activit√©},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrig√©},
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qt√© factur√©e},
		{CA factur√©},
		year = selectfacturation@year,
		yearmonth = selectfacturation@yearmonth,
		reference = selectfacturation@reference,
		article = selectfacturation@reference,
		HubSAPid = selectfacturation@HubSAPid,
		toreplicate = selectfacturation@toreplicate,
		indexcols2 = selectfacturation@indexcols2,
		origin = selectfacturation@origin,
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		{ATC performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
endjoin, endLeft union(byName: true)~> Union2
DerivedColumn4 derive(canal_final = iif( {Canal distribution}=="43" ,  "Chantier" , "Diffus" )) ~> addCanalFinal
RemoveColumns1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activit√©},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrig√©},
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qt√© factur√©e},
		{CA factur√©},
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		{ATC performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
Select9 aggregate(groupBy(Offre,
		canal,
		ATC),
	DateOffre = first(DateOffre)) ~> Aggregate2
DerivedColumn6 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		article = reference,
		{Code postal},
		marque_id = marque,
		marque_name,
		{Canal distribution},
		canal_final,
		{Secteur d'activit√©},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrig√©},
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qt√© factur√©e},
		{CA factur√©},
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		{ATC performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
Union3 derive(marque_name = iif(marque=="1604", "SaunierDuval", "Vaillant")) ~> DerivedColumn6
Select6, selectATC join(marque_name == Marque
	&& canal_final == {Canal final}
	&& {Code postal} == code_postal_atc,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAtc
JoinAtc select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activit√©},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrig√©},
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qt√© factur√©e},
		{CA factur√©},
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		{ATC performance},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activit√©},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrig√©},
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qt√© factur√©e},
		{CA factur√©},
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		{ATC performance},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select8
offre select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		{R√©f√©rence},
		Marque,
		{Quantit√©},
		Client,
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		ATC = CodeATC,
		canal = Canal,
		NbLogement,
		Produit,
		{Num√©ro interne 2},
		{Cr√©ateur offre},
		Source,
		UserLowerCase
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select9
endLeft derive(data_origin = "ecoulement sans matching",
		ca_final = ca_ecoulement,
		qt_final = toString(-1*toDouble(qt_final))) ~> positifveEcc
Union2, positifveEcc union(byName: true)~> Union3
Select8 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activitÔøΩ} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigÔøΩ} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{RÔøΩcept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{QtÔøΩ facturÔøΩe} as string,
		{CA facturÔøΩ} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_FacturationÔøΩ} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC CorrigÔøΩ} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['OModelPartedis'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		marque_id as string,
		marque_name as string,
		canal_final as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit√©} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Corrig√©} as string,
		{ATC performance} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		no_offre as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> venteDirect
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		marque_id as string,
		marque_name as string,
		NoOffre as string,
		NoCli as string,
		PA_Valide_VGF as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		{code postal} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		qt_plateforme_final as string,
		ca_plateforme_final as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DSCModel
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque_id as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit√©} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig√©} as string,
		{ATC Corrig√©} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Recept de march} as string,
		{Type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,

Avoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		Code_depot,
		NoOffre,
		reference = NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Ann√©e},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectAvoir
selectAvoir, organisaation join(selectAvoir@HubSAPid == organisaation@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Facturation, organisaation join({R√©cept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join1 filter(toDouble(Qte_Validee_VGF)>0) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(Mois = toInteger(Mois),
		{Ann√©e} = toInteger({Ann√©e}),
		canal = iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FP", "FP",     iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FS", "FS", "FC")),
		yearmonth = iif(toInteger(Mois)<10, {Ann√©e}+"0"+Mois  ,   {Ann√©e}+"0"+Mois  )) ~> typeCast
Select1 derive(id_canal_final = iif(canal=="FP", 45,     iif(canal=="FS", 51,     iif(canal=="FC", 43, 42))),
		tOrigin = "avoir") ~> mapCanalID
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = {Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		Poste,
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString = {R√©cept. de march.},
		reference = Article,
		{Qt√© factur√©e},
		{CA factur√©},
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		tOrigin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> efacturation
mapCanalID, efacturation join(Select1@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& {Ann√©e} == toInteger(year)
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& Select1@reference == efacturation@reference,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> inner
Join2 derive(month = right(yearmonth, 2),
		tOrigin = "facturation") ~> DerivedColumn1
mapCanalID, efacturation join({Ann√©e} == toInteger(year)
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& Select1@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& Select1@reference == efacturation@reference,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeft
mapCanalID, efacturation join(Select1@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& Select1@reference == efacturation@reference
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& {Ann√©e} == toInteger(year),
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullRight
typeCast select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		reference,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Ann√©e},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid = selectAvoir@HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
fullLeft filter(isNull(efacturation@tOrigin)) ~> left
left derive(data_origin = "avoir",
		id_canal_final = toString(id_canal_final)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		reference = Select1@reference,
		qt_final = Qte_Validee_VGF,
		POSSAMidString = NoCli,
		ca_final = PA_Valide_VGF,
		HubSAPid = Select1@HubSAPid,
		yearmonth = Select1@yearmonth,
		canal,
		id_canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
fullRight filter(isNull(mapCanalID@tOrigin)) ~> right
right select(mapColumn(
		marque_id,
		id_canal_final = {Canal distribution},
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString,
		reference = efacturation@reference,
		yearmonth = efacturation@yearmonth,
		HubSAPid = efacturation@HubSAPid,
		qt_final = {Qt√© factur√©e},
		ca_final = {CA factur√©}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 derive(data_origin = "facturation") ~> DerivedColumn3
inner select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		reference = Select1@reference,
		qt_final = Qte_Validee_VGF,
		ca_final = PA_Valide_VGF,
		HubSAPid = Select1@HubSAPid,
		yearmonth = Select1@yearmonth,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		marque_id,
		{Canal distribution},
		Poste,
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		{Donneur d ordre} = {Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 aggregate(groupBy(reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid),
	ca_final = first(ca_final),
		NoOffre = max(NoOffre),
		qt_final = max(qt_final),
		canal = max(canal),
		id_canal_final = max(id_canal_final),
		{ATC Corrig√©} = max({ATC Corrig√©}),
		marque_id = max(marque_id),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		{Donneur d ordre} = max({Donneur d ordre})) ~> Aggregate1
DerivedColumn4 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		NoOffre,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endInner
Aggregate1 derive(data_origin = "facturation avoir") ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(
		marque_id,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d ordre} = {Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString,
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endRight
addDataorigin select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		reference,
		qt_final,
		POSSAMidString,
		ca_final,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endLeft
DerivedColumn5, endRight union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		NoOffre,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select5, endLeft union(byName: true)~> Union2
Select6 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endDerementaiton
endInner derive(id_canal_final = toString(id_canal_final)) ~> DerivedColumn5
Union2 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
REFATC aggregate(groupBy(Marque,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc),
	Matricule = max(Matricule),
		NomATC = max(NomATC),
		ATC = max(ATC)) ~> Agregat
Agregat select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		Matricule,
		NomATC,
		ATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectcolonneATC
Offre select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		{R√©f√©rence},
		Marque,
		{Quantit√©},
		Client,
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		ATC = CodeATC,
		Canal,
		NbLogement,
		Produit,
		{Num√©ro interne 2},
		{Cr√©ateur offre},
		Source,
		UserLowerCase
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColonneOffre
SelectColonneOffre aggregate(groupBy(Offre,
		Canal,
		ATC),
	DateOffre = first(DateOffre)) ~> AgregatOffreCanalATC
AgregatOffreCanalATC select(mapColumn(
		Offre,
		canal = Canal,
		{ATC performance} = ATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOffre
endDerementaiton derive(canal_final = iif(id_canal_final=="43", "Chantier",  "Diffus")) ~> canalfinal
canalfinal select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre,
		canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selec
ExtarctionSAP select(mapColumn(
		{Agence commerciale},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		{T√©l√©phone 1},
		{Num√©ro de t√©l√©copie},
		{Org. commerciale}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSAP
Selec, SelectSAP join(POSSAMidString == Client
	&& marque_id == {Org. commerciale},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSAP
JoinSAP derive(marque_name = iif(marque_id=="1604", 'SaunierDuval', 'Vaillant'),
		distributeur = "van markes") ~> marqueNamee
marqueNamee select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre,
		canal_final,
		{Agence commerciale},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		{T√©l√©phone 1},
		{Num√©ro de t√©l√©copie},
		{Org. commerciale},
		marque_name,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCol
SelectCol, SelectcolonneATC join(canal_final == {Canal final}
	&& {Code postal} == code_postal_atc
	&& marque_name == Marque,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinATC
Select2 derive(data_origin = "avoir") ~> addDataorigin
JoinATC select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrig√©},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre,
		canal_final,
		{Agence commerciale},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		{Org. commerciale},
		marque_name,
		distributeur,
		Marque,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		Matricule,
		NomATC,
		ATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameATC
RenameATC, SelectOffre join(NoOffre == Offre,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOffre
JoinOffre select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		data_origin,
		no_offre = NoOffre,
		canal_final,
		{Code postal},
		{Org. commerciale},
		marque_name,
		distributeur,
		Marque,
		{Canal final},
		Matricule,
		NomATC,
		ATC,
		Offre,
		{ATC performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameNoOffre
organisaation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SVanMarkes.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortieVanMarkes
endDerementaiton sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['OutpoutVanMarkes'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OutputVanMarkes
renameNoOffre sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['SinkVanMarkes'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SinkVanMarkes
